TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed MediaPlaybackType extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Enumerates values returned by several types and taken as a parameter of the member.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Media.MediaPlaybackType Local = int32(0)

summary.para: The default playback type, "local", indicating the presentation of the media is happening on the same device (e.g. a phone, a tablet) as where it is controlled from.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Media.MediaPlaybackType Remote = int32(1)

summary.para: A playback type indicating the presentation of the media is happening on a different device (i.e. the remote device) than where it is controlled from.
